title: A zero-shot framework for cross-project vulnerability detection in source code
data:
R Haque, A Ali, S McClean, N Khan- Empirical Software Engineering, 2026
The growing prevalence of software vulnerabilities has increased the need for 
effective detection methods, particularly in cross-project settings where domain 
differences create significant challenges. Existing vulnerability detection models
author: Thanh Le-Cong
